items.sentence: Tom and Mary aren\'t going to do that this week.
You should eat more spinach. It\'s good for you.
I didn\'t know that Tom didn\'t have to do that.
If anyone here can help us, we\'d appreciate it.
Tom was sitting near two men in expensive suits.
Tom was talking to me about that this afternoon.
Tom didn\'t want to have anything to do with me.
You\'re really not supposed to be here, are you?
Let us know when you decide what you want to do.
I wasn\'t the one who taught Tom how to do that.
